name: Night Realm's Gift: Repaid in Full
title: Kinich: Repaid in Full
in_play_description: When your Kinich, who has this equipped, switches to become your active character or uses Canopy Hunter: Riding High: If you have the same amount or fewer cards in your Hand than your opponent, steal 1 card from their Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost, after which your opponent draws 1 card. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kinich to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
When your Kinich, who has this equipped, switches to become your active character or uses Canopy Hunter: Riding High: If you have the same amount or fewer cards in your Hand than your opponent, steal 1 card from their Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost, after which your opponent draws 1 card. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kinich in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
